QueryToFindElements.Main: SELECT a.ea_guid AS ItemGuid FROM ((((((( t_operation a INNER JOIN t_object o on o.Object_ID = a.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_package p ON p.Package_ID = o.Package_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package Package_p1 ON Package_p1.Package_ID = p.Parent_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package Package_p2 ON Package_p2.Package_ID = Package_p1.Parent_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package Package_p3 ON Package_p3.Package_ID = Package_p2.Parent_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package Package_p4 ON Package_p4.Package_ID = Package_p3.Parent_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package Package_p5 ON Package_p5.Package_ID = Package_p4.Parent_ID) WHERE a.stereotype = 'dAPIOperation'

Filters.Change: AND o.ea_guid in ( SELECT oChange.ea_guid FROM t_object oChange INNER JOIN t_objectproperties opChange ON oChange.Object_ID = opChange.Object_ID WHERE opChange.Property = 'CR' AND opChange.Value = '#SearchTerm#' )
Filters.Release: AND o.ea_guid in ( SELECT o2.ea_guid FROM (t_object o2 INNER JOIN t_objectproperties op2 ON o2.Object_ID = op2.Object_ID) WHERE op2.Property = 'CR' AND op2.Value in ( SELECT oChange.ea_guid FROM ((t_object oRelease INNER JOIN t_connector con ON oRelease.Object_ID = con.End_Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_object oChange ON con.Start_Object_ID = oChange.Object_ID) WHERE oRelease.ea_guid = '#SearchTerm#' ) )

QueryToCheckFoundElements.Main: SELECT a.Name AS ItemName , 'Attribute' as ItemType , a.ea_guid AS ItemGuid , o.Object_Type AS ElementType , a.StereoType AS ElementStereotype , p.Name AS PackageName , package_p1.Name AS PackageParentLevel1 , package_p2.Name AS PackageParentLevel2 , package_p3.Name AS PackageParentLevel3 , package_p4.Name AS PackageParentLevel4 , package_p5.Name AS PackageParentLevel5 FROM (((((((t_attribute a INNER JOIN t_object o on o.Object_ID = a.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_package p ON p.Package_ID = o.Package_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p1 ON package_p1.package_ID = p.Parent_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p2 ON package_p2.package_ID = package_p1.Parent_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p3 ON package_p3.package_ID = package_p2.Parent_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p4 on package_p4.package_ID = package_p3.Parent_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p5 on package_p5.package_ID = package_p4.Parent_ID) WHERE a.EA_GUID in (#ElementGuids#) AND a.EA_GUID in ( SELECT DISTINCT o1.EA_GUID FROM t_operation as o1 WHERE o1.Scope LIKE 'Package' OR o1.Scope LIKE 'Private' AND o1.stereotype = 'dAPIOperation' )

Check.Rationale: operations that are set as Package or Private have special meaning
Check.ProposedSolution: ensure that the Operation need to be != public
